name: CPTrip
desc: An object that represents a journey between an origin and a destination.

items.name: init(origin: MKMapItem, destination: MKMapItem, routeChoices: [CPRouteChoice])
items.desc: Creates a trip with an origin, destination, and route choices.

items.name: class CPRouteChoice
items.desc: A possible route for a trip.

items.name: var routeChoices: [CPRouteChoice]
items.desc: The list of route choices for the trip.

items.name: var userInfo: Any?
items.desc: A custom object associated with the trip.
